titles: To the Parliament of England the humble petition of the Mayor, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common-Council assembled.
author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Redmayn in Lovells-Court in Pater-noster-Row,
notes: The petition of the Mayor and commons of London in Common Council assembled, that the militia of London may be forthwith settled in the hands of citizens of known integrity and interest in the city.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Parliament --  Early works to 1800.
